start.msg: Hi {}, HentaiWatch is active! Join the support group:

help.msg: /nhentai (ID) -> It sends you the cover page along with basic information about the defined ID. /nhentai -> He sends you the cover along with basic information about the randomly chosen hentai. /changelog -> Sends you a list of the latest bot changes.

nhentai.warnmen: Would you like to send nhentai?
nhentai.publish:
Thanks for sharing the hentai to the channel.
Link to the post: {}
nhentai.MMTL: The album/media group contains too many items.
